About.title: About <highlight>Me</highlight>
About.description_part1:
I'm a software engineer passionate about building robust, scalable systems. My mission is to solve complex problems by bridging the gap

between hardware and the cloud.
About.description_part2: From low-level IoT firmware to distributed microservices and mobile apps, I work as a Software Architect designing end-to-end systems. I obsess over performance, security, and clean code.
About.current_location: Currently based in Bordeaux, working on next-gen web & IoT solutions.

Hero.title: Software Engineer | & Architect
Hero.subtitle: Crafting digital experiences with precision and passion.

About.title: About Me.
About.subtitle: The journey of a passionate <role>Alternant</role>.<newLine>Always one foot in business, one foot in school.</newLine>
About.xp_desc: 5 years of accumulated experience between apprenticeship, freelance and personal projects. Constant skill ramp-up.
About.freelance_desc: I put my technical expertise at the service of your projects. Available for short missions or long-term support.
About.freelance_cta_desc: Let's discuss your needs and build something unique.

Work.desc_p1: A collection of digital architectures and robust systems.

Contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind or just want to chat? Feel free to reach out. I'm always open to discussing new ideas.
Contact.toast_success_desc: Thanks for reaching out. I'll get back to you soon.
